techmeme.title: Lyft rolls out letting riders "favorite" or block drivers to enhance loyalty from riders and drivers; favorites get priority for future scheduled rides (Natalie Lung/Bloomberg)
In Yuga Labs vs. Ryder Ripps, an appeals court rules that NFTs are "goods" that can get trademark protection but sends the case back to a lower court (Zack Abrams/The Block)
Sources: Cognition, which makes the coding assistant Devin, is in talks to raise $300M+ at a $10B valuation; it was reportedly valued at $4B in March (Richard Nieva/Forbes)
The EU says it will investigate whether KKR provided incorrect or misleading information in its €22B acquisition of Telecom Italia's fixed-line network (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
Source: Founders Fund and Dragoneer have committed to investing $1B+ each in OpenAI's second, $30B installment of its $40B round announced in March (Sri Muppidi/The Information)
